website_summaries.verdict: With an uninteresting world and dull combat, the survival horror game ZombiU is a weak link in the Wii U's launch lineup.
pros: Fun multiplayer modes capitalize on game's strengths
cons: Heavy emphasis on dull melee combatUninteresting puzzles and mission structureWii U gamepad adds little and hurts immersion

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little late with this game but it's fun and addicting
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little late with this game but it's fun and addicting. Only thing bad is that it seems to load more than let me play. Sometimes I'll wait 45 seconds for a load screen, then walk to a door to open it only to have it load again.... Also, when you die you lose every thing you had unless you can find your old zombie person before you due again. All in all its a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The Return to Classic Survival Horror!
customer_reviews.text: Silly title aside, Zombie U is one of the finest "classic" survival horror adventure games in recent years. I am shocked at the game's poor reception. Gamers and critic complain about horror games going away, and cry for the good old days of Resident Evil...yet when such title comes along, they complain about its archaic structure and sluggish gameplay. The thing is, if you like Fatal Frame, the original Resident Evil, Dino Crisis, or even the new Outlast, then Zombie U is for you. It's a true "survival" experience, even if the graphics aren't particularly impressive. Heck, this may be one of Ubisoft's best titles in years. A must for fans of survival horror!
customer_reviews.author: Tin Salamunic

customer_reviews.title: Great game play, cool and scary
customer_reviews.text: After Watch Dogs this is my favorite video game at present. There is a nice logic to when you use your cricket bat versus a gun to kill zombies. There is a good balance of cut scenes and story to actual game play. My only complaint is there was one particularly difficult boss battle (it involves cages) that had me cursing the game, but when I finally got through it successfully (after many failed attempts) I felt like king of the (zombie) world. This game is also currently so cheap that there's no reason not to take a chance on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookenator

customer_reviews.title: Great Game...Not a FPS
customer_reviews.text: I can understand some of the bad reviews even though I disagree with them...If you're looking for a first person shooter (fps) then this is NOT a game you will be interested in. This is a Survival game with limited quantities of everything except blood sucking killer zombies. You have to strategize, conserve, and think---not run around with infinite 5.56mm rounds spraying out at 6,000 rds./min from your NATO style mini-gun!! Go play Medal of Honor...This is reminiscent of the original Resident Evil style platforms and I think its great...Go Ubisoft!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M2gunner

customer_reviews.title: This Is The Only Type Of Zombie Game For Me.
customer_reviews.text: A very unappreciated gem of a game, and one of the only zombie games I truly love. It takes survival in zombie games to the next level with permadeath if you get caught in a bad spot with zombies. Careful thinking and good use of weapons are the key points of survival in this game. They even have a survival type mode where you can see how far you can get in the campaign before you die. Once you die, your save is automatically unable to be played again. Mainly for the hardcore fans, but everyone should give it a try at least once! It is so satisfying to make it far without dying!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan P

customer_reviews.title: Fun game great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game! This is one of the first games for the WII U and you can pick it up very cheap so why not try it? If you like zombies you will love this well or hate it for killing them! Either way its a great game tons of fun. Reminds me of Resident Evil in a way but I much prefer this game. The controls are pretty good and the wii u pad makes inventory a breeze. If you do not own this grab it you cannot go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Scruffy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ZOMBIE GAME IN GENERAL
customer_reviews.text: THIS GAME IS NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNGER CHILDREN OR THOSE WITH WEAK STOMACHS. BUT IS FUN AND A GREAT HORROR GAME FOR WII U. IT IS A NICE SPIN ON THE ZOMBIE GAME GENRE WITH THE ADDED BENEFIT OF THE WII U GAME PAD, WHICH ACTS AS YOUR MAIN LIFELINE. AND THE GAME IS VERY CLEVER MAKING YOU LOOK AT THE GAMEPAD AND AWAY FROM THE TV SCREEN WHICH ADDS CHALLANGE AND SURPRISE IN PIVOTAL POINTS. I PLAYED THIS GAME FOR 3 HOURS STRAIGHT THE DAY I GOT IT, AND BASICALLY HAD NIGHTMARES AFTERWARD, BUT THAT WONT STOP ME FROM PLAYING SOME MORE!
customer_reviews.author: Runningoutofspace

customer_reviews.title: BEST GAME FOR WII U
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a super-gamer but I have a few favorite games on the WiiU (that I still have). This is one of them. The best part was not knowing anything and then learning by doing, learning what to do what not to do, etc. to finally becoming a pro. It was a blast of a game! I'm happy to beat it but also sad. There are different modes of play too. If I can enjoy the game and beat it, anyone can. Fun graphics, fun scenarios, sometimes stressful, always keeps you on your toes. 100% fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A true survival horror, how long will you survive ?
customer_reviews.text: You'll be kill over and over, and you'll explore the most dark scenarios that remember RE 1 y RE 3, your inventory is truly limited but if you are good in the administration you can successfully managed through every mission, had some mysteries to solver, for me is one of the best game on WiiU and one of the best survival horror since RE3, but be carefully, this game is not for rookies, it is very difficult stay calm in a mission to know when fight and when escape form the zombies, 'couse your objective is not kill the most zombies you can, your objetibe in this game is SURVIVE as long as you CAN !!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert SV

customer_reviews.title: Game came as described
customer_reviews.text: The game came with case and manual, I did not see any scratches and it played perfect, this game is chillin and I had it before but I bought it sgain because I never beat it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Video game player

customer_reviews.title: Hardcore
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Pure Survival Horror -Environments designed to scare -Replay Value Cons: -Minor glitches -Animations are clunky This game is not for the mindless run and gun players. You must think about how you approach a situation. Area of effect weapons such as grenade and mines do not discriminate on who it kills especially when it comes to the player character. Expect to die even when getting the best weapons in the game because of hubris. Fun and a must buy for people who want to take advantage of the Wii U tablet. The difficulty is reminicent of old school games when defeat motivates you to advance further and see what the game has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Reimel Jose

customer_reviews.title: Unique First Person Adventure
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic first person adventure every Wii U owner (and video game enthusiast for that matter) should experience. It takes some time to ramp up to the rhythm of the game and its action, but once you do it's one of the most unique and enjoyable games I've played in recent memory. It's true survival horror and should not be confused with something like Left 4 Dead. In this game you need to strategically decide what to carry, what to actively equip, and how you are going to approach what's behind the next door.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: A Cult Classic Masterpiece, that still has time to capture the center stage attention this breakthrough game deserves.
customer_reviews.text: You have to play it to understand what I'm hinting at - but if you think you know survival horror, think again. This game will make you wish you never thought to yourself it might be cool if Zombies take over. This game, redefines and breaths new life into a genre that became too predictable and more action game based. ZombiU if nothing else besides the perfect price to grab the no longer printed copies up - but if it goes down as overlooked and underrated - my heart goes out to those who missed this train.
customer_reviews.author: Sebring

customer_reviews.title: Great zombie game!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a Call of Duty Zombie game where you run around picking up infinite supplies of ammo while infinite waves of zombies attack. This is an unfolding story where you're trying to survive. Sometimes that means fighting, sometimes is means sneaking away until a better opportunity arrives. Ammo is precious, so you use it as a last resort. Realistic zombie game is an oxymoron, I know, but this game feels "realistic". Slight con: I wish I could use the wiimote to point-n-shoot instead of the tablet -- it's easier for me to aim. However, the secondary screen on the tablet is used well, so it would be impossible to use both controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Neswold

customer_reviews.title: Not what ubisoft said would be.
customer_reviews.text: At beginning with al the cinematics a trailers zombiu looked like the main reason to get a wii u, finally when i purchased I got disappointed, a friend told me the game was horrible but i wanted to give it a chance, use the pad for this game is uncomfortable in certain moments and actions, the graphics are not color like the shown in the trailers, finally i sold it, there are better games than this one for wii u.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: This is just a great survival game
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great survival game. The creepy atmosphere and art style really make it work. Ammo is sparse, as it should be, and survival is not easy. You'll be frustrated a number of times before finishing your mission. This is one of the better Nintendo exclusives at utilizing the game pad screen. You have to use it to access your map and manage your inventory. The mysterious prepper, who is always in your ear, adds to the overall suspense. You can pick this up cheap and it's well worth it if you're a fan of the genre.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered The Walking Dead late, but after finishing season 5 was having withdrawals and this game helped with that. I bought it for $10, which was totally worth it. Graphics and game play is awesome if you understand that this is a survivor game, not a run & gun game. I'm only a couple hours into it and really enjoying it so far. If you have played and enjoyed Resident Evil 4, you'll like this.
customer_reviews.author: SouthPaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the Wii U console as a whole but this game rocks! I don't understand the negative reviews that this game was given and I'm glad I didn't take those reviews to heart. I picked this up on sale at Amazon for $20 dollars but I would not have been disappointed if I had purchased it for full price. So far, this is the only bright spot in my experience with the Wii U. I wish there were plans for a sequel but I heard those plans were scrapped. Money on a sequel would have been well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Crane

customer_reviews.title: Love this game.
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged well. The item came at the time that it said it would arrive. I enjoy this game on many levels. I took my time beating this game. When I actually beat the game I replay the game and played it on a different difficulty level. I know that the system is sort of outdated but I still play on this system
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Map, radar and inventory is on the game pad. It's easy to die, ammo must be used accurately and sparingly. The game pad gyroscope is used for turrets, hacking and marking zombies. Local multiplayer gets boring very fast, no true co-op play. In my opinion they made a good game that could of been great. Cons: 1) Graphics could be better. 2) One melee weapon. 3) No good multiplayer/co-op mode.
customer_reviews.author: Caseymac

customer_reviews.title: It was a great decisions because even though you get jump-scares every now ...
customer_reviews.text: Suspense and adrenaline all throughout the story. I've never been into scary games (nor movies) but I bought this game because of curiosity. It was a great decisions because even though you get jump-scares every now and then, it is a very interesting game with awesome gaming dynamics.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game For Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: The controls do take some time to get used to but I do like the way the game is set up! Definitely is a survival type game and incorporating the touch gaming pad gives it more of a realistic feel for having to stay alive (Looking through your inventory on the game pad screen while watching the tv screen to make sure no zombies are coming, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Loads of scary fun. Definitely a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: This game really throws you in a hard surreal place. Where you're resources are limited and every candy bar and bullet is very valuable. There's real strategy here, and how one goes about it is up to them. There's always a good spontaneous scare around the corner and this game will make you jump from surprises every now and then. Definitely give it a go . Must say though this game isn't for everyone. Specially people that are not patient nor have strategy.
customer_reviews.author: Xander 88

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Survival Horror
customer_reviews.text: Very intense game, not a run n gun at all. Unlike the newer resident evil games it takes some thought and some strategic planning. I recommend it to any survival horror fan. Don't listen to those negative reviews, I'm assuming they are Call of Duty fans, which I enjoy too, I just have a more broad spectrum of taste in games. How the gamepad is incorporated is amazing, if you like intense survival horror, do not pass this one up, it keeps you on your toes at all times, sometimes to the point of panic when you're trying to get from point A to point B with too many zombies to kill in between.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god, this game is nutso!!!! The graphics are amazing to the point of legitimate fright, the role play is easy and smoothly manipulated as far as movement. Be prepared however, game play starts immediately and is super fast paced! If Resident Evil had a bigger, meaner brother, it would be Zombie U.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Zombie Fans.. relax THIS is a GREAT game
customer_reviews.text: i give it a 5/5 Fast-Shipping Handled with the up most care GREAT PRICE!! AMAZING graphics for a WiiU game, right from the start, your pulled into a hair-raising get away from the undead, the back-story is great and the number of weapons you can use makes the Zombie killing even greater... however.. Ammo is limited and you will need to do a LOT of exploring to find stuff (like any survival simulation) and remember one BITE on this game = GAME OVER so ... try not to go "Rambo" on a horde Anyways!.. out of all the Zombie games i've played i recommend this game to EVERYONE who is curious about it or owns a WiiU
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty special game when compared to most of its contemporaries
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty special game when compared to most of its contemporaries. It's been a while since a true survival horror game came out... your ammo is very limited, there are a LOT of zombies to deal with and it is very easy to get overwhelmed and die. The game forces you to think about what you are going to do versus just react to what happens... because if you don't plan, you will die.
customer_reviews.author: bluewandersTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 6 pee wads out of 10 for scariness
customer_reviews.text: Love the game. At first it seem the game changed things up whenever I got munched. Which is unusual because most games have a gauntlet to work through and once you know where the bad guys are going to pop out, it pretty easy to get through the game. Six pee wads out of 10 for scariness.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Fun horror game
customer_reviews.text: Could be better on graphics but where talking 2010 here so give it a break.only play if you aren't scared easily I bought this game thinking it was like call of duty but it was better in a story kind of way grey game overall
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game! I've always played kid games, but decided to order this since I love the Walking Dead. The graphics are great and I love having missions. I am stuck at the fighting arena so I started another game and I've honestly enjoyed playing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Husky

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Too scary for my kids but I liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dickens

customer_reviews.title: I loved playing this game
customer_reviews.text: I loved playing this game and I beet to :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Intense survival game for the Wii U, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: ZombiU's an interesting game, focused more on always being aware of your surroundings and avoiding confrontations while searching and scavenging rather than looking for fights. Plus having a guy you've never met communicating over a radio helping you out while performing tasks adds an interesting aspect to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: one of the best zombie games
customer_reviews.text: This game was one of the best zombie game i have played. I really liked they way they formated the game with the incorperation of the WIIU controller. Its actually scary and requires stadegy. i get upset when my charecter dies and i have to kill him via a new charecter. But the zombies always reappear so it is always scary and exciting. I wish i had more ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Tech_Geek

customer_reviews.title: A very good value buy for the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: A very good value buy for the Wii U. They did some really cool things with this game. I couldn't imagine opening up the wallet for $50 or $60 on this game, but for anything under $25 it's a great buy. You get to experience playing video games in a whole new way with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good game, even kinda scary.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game at the same time I ordered my Wii u. I wasn't expecting much from this game, mainly bought it because it was cheap. I was pleasantly surprised to find out this game utilizes the Wii u gamepad in fun and interesting ways. The game also has cool environments, good scares, fun gameplay, as well as interesting story. Well worth the money, I would recommend this game!
customer_reviews.author: Blackwatur

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good game
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good game, I was skeptical about it at first, but after watching gameplay videos and reading some good reviews, I bought it yesterday, and got it today in the mail with amazon prime :D this is worth you're time trust me! it has a good Zombie scare to it, you're always going to find stuff to survive and plus it looks great, the Wii U Gamepad comes in handy with the game!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lad

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for hard core gamers
customer_reviews.text: Maybe higher if I played it longer. Honestly it is scary and I'm not scared easily. A zombie jumps out of nowhere and trust me you will jump. If it had a more casual gamer difficulty level I would have given it 5 stars. Really cool dynamics. You re spawn to fight your last player. Very cool premise. Blows Resident evil out the water.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun GAME
customer_reviews.text: a Lot of mainstream videogame reviews Gave this game a Bad Rep, But i been playing games for a long time now and I Can tell you this game is Great, Sure its no Dead island but it doesn't have to be there is a lot of cool features and it Uses The Abilities of the WII U Well. All in all. GET THIS GAME ;0
customer_reviews.author: Psycho Metal

customer_reviews.title: Zombie SURVIVAL game.
customer_reviews.text: I felt the need to post my first ever review for a game on Amazon because of the ridiculous 1 star reviews. This game is a SURVIVAL game. This is not an action game. If you are looking for fast paced gunz'a'blazing shoot'em up, this is not it. This is a tense, gritty, hard, survival game. The atmosphere is incredibly spooky. The gameplay is immersive bordering on realism. If you own a Wii-U, are an adult, and enjoy a thrilling challenge or fright, get this game.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The only reason this game got bad reviews is because it was hard
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this game got bad reviews is because it was hard. People with OCD that want to move through a game with a single character and never die will not like this game. It is more realistic by making you sort through your bag in real time. If you want to move things around you had better do it in your safe house and don't forget to prepare your BOB b4 you go out. lol
customer_reviews.author: LostSoul083

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it’s a fun game, but it does seem to feel repetitive at times.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: ZombiU Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Players must tread carefully if they want to really understand what ZombiU is about. For example, it's best to lure zombies out one-by-one, since too many will certainly overcome the player (and result in a frustrating experience). Most importantly, one bite and it's over for you. With that in mind, you have to truly act like a survivor to make any progress in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Pena

customer_reviews.title: Good game, short...but good.
customer_reviews.text: If you own a Wii U, this is a must get game. Cheap and fun. However it is short, maybe a week of gameplay if you’re just some person. But for a gamer like me, about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Got a non worrking disk
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, my wii works just fine so I know it's a bad disk. Contacted seller weeks ago and still no response.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Survival Horror
customer_reviews.text: This game was honestly a lot better than I was expecting. I hadn't played a survival horror game since resident evil 4 on the wii, and even that game was beginning to pull away from the survival horror genre so I can say my experience with survival horror is almost none. This game can be very tense and extremely atmospheric and that makes very fitting for the survival horror genre. If you are looking for a core gaming experience and something that will make you work to be successful and doesn't hold your hand then look no further than ZombiU, a great Wii U exclusive.
customer_reviews.author: IronLung

customer_reviews.title: Missing game. Check it when you get it
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed I ordered this game for my kids for Christmas. The box came and no game. I did not check the game until after Christmas. My kids was disappointed when it was empty. I have tried to get it returned there is a policy of no returns. I have been an Amazon customer for yrs now.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Whisnant

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Scary!
customer_reviews.text: This game has a lot going for it. Graphics, sounds, game play, and just overall atmosphere are at a high level. It engages all your senses and makes you want to survive. Every Wii U owner should give it at least a try because it's such a unique and scary experience!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: super fun  to play
customer_reviews.text: this game is super fun to play when u shoot u have to look at the wiiu controller to see what u are about to shoot cant stop playing I would like if they make a lot more games that handle this this one changing weapons shooting healing just super fun
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: GIVE THIS GAME A TRY.
customer_reviews.text: FOR A WII U LANUCH TITLE THIS IS AN UNDERRATED GAME THAT CAN'T BE FORGOTTEN. GREAT GAMEPLAY, AN INTERESTING SETTING USING LONDON AS THE SET POINT. GIVE IT A TRY YOU MIGHT LIKE THIS GAME.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Beware might come defected
customer_reviews.text: ZombiU arrived on time packaging was good. Disk is immaculate. But it freezes/crashes before I can even get passed the main menu. Heard good things about the game. See if I can get a replacement and Im so dissapointed. I heard it's a common issue with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some bugs and gliches but it you reset it get fix
customer_reviews.author: moris

customer_reviews.title: ZombiU Know What To Review
customer_reviews.text: Still haven't finished the game but I like it a lot. It's fun. A great zombie game.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thoroughly enjoying this game so far. I just got a Wii U and I'm loving that this game fully utilized the gamepad. I was a bit surprised that a Nintendo console would have a zombie game, and I gotta say, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harter

customer_reviews.title: BEST ZOMBIE GAME EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST ZOMBIE GAME EVER! This game was fun from beginning to end! The multiplayer is great as well and so unique that your friends that have not seen the Wii U will truly get a lot of enjoyment out of it. I have a friend that was a Wii U hater.... then he played this game. He now wants to come over just to play this game.
customer_reviews.author: mitchewix

customer_reviews.title: Great Zombie Survival game on the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: This is a great zombie survival game. The graphics are nice and the gameplay is eerie. It takes a little bit of getting used to the features of the Wii U gamepad in relation to the game, but after that it's easy to understand. At around $20-$25, this game is a steal!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game. It was super scary and had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game. It was super scary and had a good deal of difficulty. Definitely gonna play through this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Pelthail

customer_reviews.title: Very challenging game.
customer_reviews.text: I am having a ton of fun with this game. It's very challenging using both the touch screen and the TV. There's a little bit of a learning curve. I do find the game startling at times and the tension that is built using the tracker is quite daunting. The open world gameplay always keeps you on your toes. Long story short, I die a lot! But it's the fun kinda dying. :)
customer_reviews.author: Guy T. Koepp Ohana

customer_reviews.title: Weird at first, but very entertaining once you get ...
customer_reviews.text: Weird at first, but very entertaining once you get the hang of things. I wish it was longer though. They should have made a part 2.
customer_reviews.author: Ron E

customer_reviews.title: This game is cool. It's sort of slow paced and can get ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is cool. It's sort of slow paced and can get annoying but overall I had fun and would love to see a polished sequel
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: She has enjoyed playing it and recommends it for the wii U
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is into all the zombile and walking dead things at the moment. She has enjoyed playing it and recommends it for the wii U.
customer_reviews.author: Lacbrit

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly cool game. My husband and son love playing
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly cool game. My husband and son love playing. It's only one player, but my boy likes watching his dad play and would help him watch for items. Definitely recommend to any who likes first person or zombie games
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: and its only 20 bucks
customer_reviews.text: This game is truly amazing yea the graphics are a bit choppy at times and there are some bugs but seriously this is my favorite game so far on the Wii u don't believe all the bad reviews on it if you have the Wii u you need to experience this game
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Game for the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: I am only about half way through the game, but I really love it. It is challenging enough to keep you entertained but not so hard that you want to give up and never play again. I highly recommend this game to any Wii U owners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Godwin

customer_reviews.title: I dig it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool game. I'm not a huge gamer, and I haven't beaten this game but it's fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M.

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: couldn't really get into the story, thought it was boring...
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Mariscal

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Good game but I never really got into it. Got it off amazon for under 20 bucks which is why I got it in the first place. Game is slow paced but deff worth a play if you like zombie/survival games
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: Not the best decision from Ubisoft, was good but not enough for a new generation of consoles
customer_reviews.author: Aldair C

customer_reviews.title: Really good game, but the lack of support by Ubisoft ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good game, but the lack of support by Ubisoft and all of the glitches are really bad. As a survival I really enjoyed it and the series has great potential.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago D. Albuquerque

customer_reviews.title: Excellent under rated game
customer_reviews.text: One of the two most under rated games I have played in a very (very!) long time. The dynamics are really good, but I can understand if some people don't like them, because it can be a make or brake kind of game
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Palomares Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool game for the money
customer_reviews.text: pretty cool game for the money. not very child friendly, so dont get this for your 6 year old. lol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty fun. Not particularly scary, but there has definitely some intense sequences. Not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Zacary C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Item as discribed
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the game physically. But, the game (play-wise) is not as good as I thought it would be. If you want it; wait till you can find it for a really cheap price, then pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: fun zombie action
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun feels like a true survivor horror game. Main reason I take a point off is cause I hate how you become a different character after dying.
customer_reviews.author: Kaim

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: fun inexpensive game! way cheaper on here than in stores what a great deal
customer_reviews.author: peyton

customer_reviews.title: Best zombie game I've played in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best zombie game I've played in a long time, really makes you think of what to do since you have scarce supplies. Brings back the horror aspect of zombies.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Game
customer_reviews.text: The best Wii U game ever. I've spent over 200 hours playing and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with the wife and friends!
customer_reviews.text: I love the multiplayer vs. mode, it is pretty fun sending zombies after the Mrs. and having her scream at me! I haven't played too much of the campaign, but this makes a fun party game!
customer_reviews.author: FxMerc

customer_reviews.title: While not a perfect game, it does a very good job demonstrating ...
customer_reviews.text: While not a perfect game, it does a very good job demonstrating other types of games that can be enhanced with the Wii U gamepad.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't read a single magazine article about this game.
customer_reviews.text: Game Informer gave ZombiU a 5/10.... They obviously didn't "get" it. This is not a shooter, this is not an action game, and it certainly isn't your typical FPS. If you expect Call of Duty Zombies, you are not in the right place. This game is horrifying, slow (and well) paced, difficult, and very detailed. It makes great use of the Nintendo Gamepad. It was the best Wii U game, at least before Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate came out. BUY BUY BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Bryant

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Legitimately scary but nothing special. At times a bit boring.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Reed

customer_reviews.title: On my just what we need more zombies. Well ...
customer_reviews.text: On my just what we need more zombies. Well I must say this is a really interesting game only warning is don't play it in the dark. Ha! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, but can't see myself playing it more than a few times honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed playing through Zombi U. It's sad how this game got such terrible reviews. It's actually really good in my opinion. I've played all the resident evil games, silent hill, fatal frame etc. Zombi U deserves to be up there with the greats. The game came in mint, brand new condition. Also A lot cheaper then if I had bought it even used at like gamestop. Very happy with the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love zombies
customer_reviews.text: Zombie survival, how can it get any better. Game looks great even for a old title.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond

customer_reviews.title: it looks like you are watching a movie
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat game. My teen son plays it a lot .it looks like you are watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: I am a zombie genre fan forever. This game is cool.
customer_reviews.text: Play this game during the day and they Should have made it more than a one player game. You will need the help also the guide!
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this game when I initially purchased it for my a son on sale for our WiiU but let me tell you this game is addictive and hard. It offers great use of the game pad and the initial reviews for the game don't do it any justice. If your a fan of survival horror games then pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Wii zombies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who loves zombie games. He was a little sceptical at first, but loves the game. He even gets scared from some of the scenery and zombies in the game.
customer_reviews.author: tinatuom

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my brother-in-law and he enjoyed playing it. He spent many hours in front of the tv!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany E Avery

customer_reviews.title: ZombiU
customer_reviews.text: If you like Zombies. you will enjoy playing this game. It was a present for the holiday and they enjoyed playing the game off and on all day. I would highly recommend this zombie game.
customer_reviews.author: Needmore

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is super scary, a bit too much for me, but my cousin really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: guamie

customer_reviews.title: Running away from 3 Zombies would have never crossed my ...
customer_reviews.text: Running away from 3 Zombies would have never crossed my mind as a possibility but this game successfully deters me from making life-threatening moves in the wrong direction.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Baggett

customer_reviews.title: Cool Game
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys playing this game. Graphics are pretty good and the game is pretty easy once you get a hang of it. The game was shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Game on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. My brother loves horror games and was very happy to get this. Product arrived as advertised. Price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mack

customer_reviews.title: Best zombi game I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: Best zombi game I have ever played, very fun. It has a bit of a learning curve and I die alot, but it's been a long time since I have played a game that can make me scream and jump!
customer_reviews.author: auralia

customer_reviews.title: NICEEEE
customer_reviews.text: This game is very addictive. I had a hard time utting it down. I do feel that it could have been longer tho. But I would recommend this game to anyone who love these types of games.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Game.
customer_reviews.text: This Game is scary. Like very scary. Also this game is innovative, and highly polished. A great example to see where the wii u is headed. I'm excited.
customer_reviews.author: Hustles

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out!  They're coming to get us
customer_reviews.text: Actually, this was a gift for my grandson. He LOVES THIS GAME! He and his brother try not to fight over it too much, but it is one of their favorite Wii U games.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Avila

customer_reviews.title: Popular game, works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as an Xmas present and the DVD works great. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

product_meta.title: ZombiU - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description: Protective case for web tablet - black - for Apple iPad (3rd generation); iPad 1; 2; iPad with Retina display (4th generation)
feature_bullets: Two Screens, Twice The Fear - Feel the tension mount as you try to keep an eye on your TV and controller screen.
Survival-Horror Action At Its Best - Resources are in short supply while your enemies are legion, and you never know when you will find more weapons, ammunition, first aid and food.
Don't Leave Home Without Your BOB: The new WiiU controller becomes your Bug-Out Bag, the ultimate all-in-one survival kit for your tools, inventory, med kits, maps and more.
Unique Death Mechanic - If you die, you wake up to play an entirely new character who is another survivor in the same terrifying position.
Horde At Your Door - Stock up on guns, ammo and supplies, and lock down your Safe House!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars680 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
